The more old you are the faster you get older

Scary isn’t it? Â I hate to write about this topic but really, I wan’t my skin to stop wrinkling!! I know, I did it to myself with all the sun bathing. Â I should have listened when they tried to tell me and now all I hear is ” I told you so.”

I don’t need anyone to tell me because I’m paying the price for not listening, believe me! Â I bleach my legs from all the sun spots but really, I can cover my legs. Â What I can’t cover is how much my hands, my face and all the rest of the areas that have to be exposed everyday show how much and how fast I’m getting old.

Sure, I should be grateful for what I have like my son said to me when I was folding clothes one day “I hate my hands” and he said “well mom, at least you have hands.” Damn him!! He is right! And at that moment, my nineteen year old son gave me perspective.

Not that I don’t have perspective but, I am not always grateful I guess. Â He’s right! Â I should be grateful instead of complaining about how my hands are aging and yes, I should be grateful because some people never make it to my age (50 in a few months) but, well, while writing this post, I’m realizing that…
